name: go-struct-tag-highlighter
description: Highlights Go struct tags with theme-aware colors for improved readability and customization.

goStructTagHighlighter.colors.dark.key.description: Color for struct tag keys in dark mode

goStructTagHighlighter.colors.dark.value.description: Color for struct tag values in dark mode

goStructTagHighlighter.colors.light.key.description: Color for struct tag keys in light mode

goStructTagHighlighter.colors.light.valu.description: Color for struct tag values in light mode

scripts.compile: yarn run check-types && yarn run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: yarn run check-types && yarn run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: yarn run compile-tests && yarn run compile && yarn run lint
